product_name: Big Agnes Bitter Springs UL 1 Tent
long_description: With an ultralight, trekking-pole-supported design, this spacious 1-person, 3-season backpacking tent features a mesh body, single door and oversized vestibule that keeps gear dry outside the tent.
short_description: With an ultralight, trekking-pole-supported design, this spacious 1-person, 3-season backpacking tent features a mesh body, single door and oversized vestibule that keeps gear dry outside the tent.
